description: I am a full stack web developer with a touch of originality. My atypical journey, from soldier to coder, doesn't lack spice! I've swapped my rangers for lines of code, but I keep the fighting spirit in the creativity of a site, the choice of language and the resolution of bugs.
crm_description: Edge is a Jira-style CRM, it allows you to create workspaces, projects and tasks. It is also possible to share a workspace so that members can see the projects and different tasks assigned to them.
burger_house_description: Burger House is a showcase website that I developed to highlight my front-end skills. It enables users to visualize the UI/UX design.
brunch_delice_description: Brunch Delice is a website which was designed and developed to provide a user-friendly interface. With particular attention to the user experience.
budget_app_description: Budget App is an intuitively designed budget management application aimed at helping users effectively manage their personal or business finances.
forge_pass_description: Forge Pass is an application I designed to meet a critical security need: generating strong, secure passwords.
name: Name
footer_p: Let's turn lines of code into memorable digital experiences.
